name: Delivery Time (ksoun)
description:
Game a Week prototype 7 based on the theme of "reward/money/monetisation". The player is put into a perspective of a very lazy delivery driver that has to make his quota before the end of his shift to earn his check. You have 30 seconds to deliver 20 packages. Make sure you're careful with the packages.

Instructions:
WASD - Movement

E - Pick up item

NOTE: I do not own any of the assets I used & the rights belong to their respective owners. This was created purely for educational purposes. 

Song by: idecideme - Ninomae Ina'nis Loading Screen BUT Remixed (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kCXVcaNasU4)
